bibl.title: A.M. NOBBS and J.W. PRYOR, New Documents Illustrating Early Christianity. 9. A Review of the Greek Inscriptions and Papyri published in 1986-87. In Honour of Paul Barnett.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Inscriptions [1-12]. - Papyri [13-23]. - Judaica [24-27]. - Ecclesiastica [28-31]. - Indexes.
bibl.seg: LLEWELYN S.R., in collaboration with M. HARDING, J.R. HARRISON, T.W. HILLARD, E.A. JUDGE, R.A. KEARSLEY, J.M. LIEU, A.M. NOBBS and J.W. PRYOR, New Documents Illustrating Early Christianity. 9. A Review of the Greek Inscriptions and Papyri published in 1986-87. In Honour of Paul Barnett.

North Ryde, Austr., Macquarie University, The Ancient History Documentary Research Centre - Grand Rapids, Michigan - Cambridge, U.K., W.B. Eerdmans, 2002, 8°, xvi-136 pp., 1 tabl. ISBN 0-8028-4519-3. $35.
Introduction. - Inscriptions [1-12]. - Papyri [13-23]. - Judaica [24-27]. - Ecclesiastica [28-31]. - Indexes.
C.R. par Adam Serfass, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2003/2003-06-46.html >. - Geneviève Husson, BibO 61 (2004) coll. 560-561.
Llewelyn Harding Harrison Hillard Judge Kearsley Lieu Nobbs Pryor
